name: Primitive Survival
description: Collect resources, build a base, defend yourself against monsters, do everything to survive!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
